source:
Hello World

This is an AMP Story.

Best walk ever!

sections.doc_:
## Introduction

Learn how to create your first AMP Story. The [`amp-story`](/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-story-v1.0.md) extension provides a new format for displaying visual content.
sections.cachedMarkedDoc:
Introduction

Learn how to create your first AMP Story. The amp-story extension provides a new format for displaying visual content.
sections.normalizedDoc_:
## Introduction

Learn how to create your first AMP Story. The [`amp-story`](/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-story-v1.0.md) extension provides a new format for displaying visual content.

sections.doc_: AMP Stories are written using AMPHTML and they use their own AMP extension: `amp-story`. The first step is to import the `amp-story` in the header.
sections.normalizedDoc_: AMP Stories are written using AMPHTML and they use their own AMP extension: `amp-story`. The first step is to import the `amp-story` in the header.

sections.doc_: AMP Stories can make use of other AMP extensions such as `amp-video`. However, AMP Stories support only a subset of the available AMP extensions. You can find a full list of the supported extensions [here](/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-story.md#children-of-amp-story-grid-layer).
sections.normalizedDoc_: AMP Stories can make use of other AMP extensions such as `amp-video`. However, AMP Stories support only a subset of the available AMP extensions. You can find a full list of the supported extensions [here](/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-story.md#children-of-amp-story-grid-layer).

sections.code:
<title>Stories in AMP - Hello World</title>
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
<link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/introduction/stories_in_amp/index.html">
<style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>

sections.doc_: Stories can be styled using CSS:
sections.code:
<style amp-custom>
  amp-story {
    font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI ", Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji ", "Segoe UI Emoji ", "Segoe UI Symbol ";
  }
  amp-story-page * {
    color: white;
    text-align: center;
  }
  [template=thirds] {
    padding: 0;
  }
</style>
sections.normalizedDoc_: Stories can be styled using CSS:

sections.doc_: Stories are declared inside the `amp-story` tag. Story-level metadata is provided via attributes. (The first four attributes are mandatory; the final two are optional, but recommended.) Note that this metadata augments, but does not replace, [Structured Data](https://developers.google.com/search/docs/data-types/article#amp).
sections.code:
<amp-story standalone
  title="Stories in AMP - Hello World"
  publisher="AMP Project"
  publisher-logo-src="http://localhost:8080/favicons/coast-228x228.png"
  poster-portrait-src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/story_dog2_portrait.jpg"
  poster-square-src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/story_dog2_square.jpg"
  poster-landscape-src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/story_dog2_landscape.jpg">
sections.preview:
<amp-story standalone
    title="Stories in AMP - Hello World"
    publisher="AMP Project"
    publisher-logo-src="http://localhost:8080/favicons/coast-228x228.png"
    poster-portrait-src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/story_dog2_portrait.jpg"
    poster-square-src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/story_dog2_square.jpg"
    poster-landscape-src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/story_dog2_landscape.jpg">
sections.normalizedDoc_: Stories are declared inside the `amp-story` tag. Story-level metadata is provided via attributes. (The first four attributes are mandatory; the final two are optional, but recommended.) Note that this metadata augments, but does not replace, [Structured Data](https://developers.google.com/search/docs/data-types/article#amp).

sections.doc_: A story consists of one or more pages. Each page is declared by an `amp-story-page` element. Pages are designed by layering videos, images and text. Here we have a page that uses two layers. One layer filling the available space with an image and one text layer that shows a heading.
sections.code:
Hello World

This is an AMP Story.
sections.preview:
Hello World

This is an AMP Story.
sections.normalizedDoc_: A story consists of one or more pages. Each page is declared by an `amp-story-page` element. Pages are designed by layering videos, images and text. Here we have a page that uses two layers. One layer filling the available space with an image and one text layer that shows a heading.

sections.doc_: Here we have a page consisting of a video which autoplays and loops.
sections.code:
<amp-story-page id="page-2">
  <amp-story-grid-layer template="fill">
    <amp-video autoplay
      loop
      width="720"
      height="960"
      poster="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/story_video_dog_cover.jpg"
      layout="responsive">
      <source src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/video/story_video_dog.mp4"
        type="video/mp4">
    </amp-video>
  </amp-story-grid-layer>
</amp-story-page>
sections.preview:
<amp-story-page id="page-2">
      <amp-story-grid-layer template="fill">
        <amp-video autoplay
          loop
          width="720"
          height="960"
          poster="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/story_video_dog_cover.jpg"
          layout="responsive">
          <source src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/video/story_video_dog.mp4"
            type="video/mp4">
        </amp-video>
      </amp-story-grid-layer>
    </amp-story-page>
sections.normalizedDoc_: Here we have a page consisting of a video which autoplays and loops.

sections.doc_: Pre-defined entry animations make it possible to create dynamic pages without videos. The length and initial delay can be customized using the `animate-in-duration` and `animate-in-delay` properties. The [animations sample](/documentation/examples/visual-effects/amp_story_animations/) shows all available animantions in action.
sections.code: Best walk ever!
sections.preview: Best walk ever!
sections.normalizedDoc_: Pre-defined entry animations make it possible to create dynamic pages without videos. The length and initial delay can be customized using the `animate-in-duration` and `animate-in-delay` properties. The [animations sample](/documentation/examples/visual-effects/amp_story_animations/) shows all available animantions in action.

sections.doc_: Stories can use predefined layouts to style the page. Here we're using the `thirds` template. For an overview about the available layouts take a look at the [layouts sample](/documentation/examples/style-layout/amp_story_layouts/).
sections.code:
<amp-story-page id="layout-demo">
  <amp-story-grid-layer template="thirds">
    <amp-img grid-area="upper-third"
      src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/story_thirds_1.jpg"
      width="560"
      height="420"
      layout="responsive">
    </amp-img>
    <amp-img grid-area="middle-third"
      src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/story_thirds_2.jpg"
      width="560"
      height="420"
      layout="responsive">
    </amp-img>
    <amp-img grid-area="lower-third"
      src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/story_thirds_3.jpg"
      width="560"
      height="420"
      layout="responsive">
    </amp-img>
  </amp-story-grid-layer>
</amp-story-page>
sections.preview:
<amp-story-page id="layout-demo">
      <amp-story-grid-layer template="thirds">
        <amp-img grid-area="upper-third"
          src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/story_thirds_1.jpg"
          width="560"
          height="420"
          layout="responsive">
        </amp-img>
        <amp-img grid-area="middle-third"
          src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/story_thirds_2.jpg"
          width="560"
          height="420"
          layout="responsive">
        </amp-img>
        <amp-img grid-area="lower-third"
          src="http://localhost:8080/static/samples/img/story_thirds_3.jpg"
          width="560"
          height="420"
          layout="responsive">
        </amp-img>
      </amp-story-grid-layer>
    </amp-story-page>
sections.normalizedDoc_: Stories can use predefined layouts to style the page. Here we're using the `thirds` template. For an overview about the available layouts take a look at the [layouts sample](/documentation/examples/style-layout/amp_story_layouts/).

sections.doc_: A "bookend" panel containing links to other resources will appear on the last page of your story if you include an `amp-story-bookend` that references a [bookend JSON config](/static/samples/json/bookend.json).
sections.normalizedDoc_: A "bookend" panel containing links to other resources will appear on the last page of your story if you include an `amp-story-bookend` that references a [bookend JSON config](/static/samples/json/bookend.json).

<meta charset="utf-8">
    <script async src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0.js"></script>
    
    <script async custom-element="amp-video" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-video-0.1.js"></script>
    <title>Stories in AMP - Hello World</title>
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
    <link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/introduction/stories_in_amp/index.html">
    <style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
